- The girls powerlifting state meet has been postponed http://www.thswpa.com/
- MATHCOUNTS state and national competitions have been cancelled https://www.mathcounts.org/2020-national-competition
- UIL Basketball Tournament Suspended Until Further Notice bit.ly/39NgMLo
- 2020 FIRST World (Robotics) Competition has been cancelled https://www.firstinspires.org/covid-19
- UIL postpones two of their state events CX Debate State Tournament and State Robotics FIRST Tech Challenge https://www.uiltexas.org/site-news/academics
- State Basketball Tournament is still on with limited access to games.
